prompts: Create a Pokemon that looks like a giant block with legs and a modern design.
I want a unique Pokemon with a cube-shaped body and mechanical-like features.
Generate a creature that resembles a stack of bricks with robotic appendages.
Make an interesting Pokemon that has a geometric shape and multiple tentacle-like limbs.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines ancient architecture with a futuristic twist.
Design a Pokemon inspired by robotics and natural stone formations.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a fortress or a tower, with a sturdy presence.
